artist: Unknown American; RCA Victor Manufacturing Co., Inc.
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Plastic with overlay graphic image of Noel Coward with selected titles of his songs on both sides; received in black frame. "RCA Presents: Noel Coward with Leo Reisman and his Orchestra in a program of Noel Coward Songs."
title: Phonograph record
